TopicTitle: KSP won't start after Windows 10 Fall Creators Update

Articles.Content:
Unmodded install.  After I updated Windows 10 with the Fall Creator's update, KSP will not start.  It just displays a blank window.  Tried re-installing and running both 32-bit and 64-bit, but nothing helped.  Any other ideas?

Anyone else hit this issue?
Try updating your graphic card driver. The win10 update may have messed with it.

Thanks for the idea.  I did update my graphics driver for nVIDIA using the GEForce Experience.  However, I still get the same problem. 

I noticed that the game is technically running (I can hear the sound of the intro screen, but nothing is displaying.  When I mouse-over the icon in the task bar, it shows a translucent window with nothing in it, like where KSP would be if it was actually displaying anything.

Any other ideas?  Thanks for the help!  I really miss KSP.
Also try the solutions on this other thread:
